Jarrod.action: Encourages the group to go to the roof to get picked up by the helicopter.

Jarrod.action: Dismisses Oliver's warnings and tells him to back off.

Jarrod.action: Attempts to open the master patio door to let the soldiers in despite Oliver's objections.

Jarrod.action: Elbows emergency glass to get a fire axe and encourages Elaine to come on.
